name: Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE
description:
Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE - explore, craft, run and fight! Find the exit out of the labyrinth!

Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE - enter the dangerous labyrinth and explore it! A maze full of dangerous traps, terrifying monsters and exciting challenges is waiting for you! You are a maze runner, the last one who was sent to this mysterious and full of secrets labyrinth. The only wish you have is to survive, so you have to try hard to find the exit. You will meet dangerous traps, lava, obstacles and fake walls on your way. And if you want to pass all this mess, you are to craft some instruments and tools like axe, pick-axe and others. But don’t think that this will be to easy for you! You only can explore the labyrinth during day time because something strange and terrible happens at nights. That is why it is better to spend nights in the center of the labyrinth, at home.

In Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE you will looking for all kinds of goods and resources in the labyrinth. Chop down trees and mine stones to collect everything that is useful. But what is most important is that you have to eat and drink. Look for the stuff left from other maze runners that were in this crazy maze before you. In the theirs’ bags you will find water and food that will help you to survive another day!

***FEATURES***

● Huge maze to explore
● Super cool craft system
● Puzzle challenges and logic riddles
● Dangerous traps and monsters
● Dynamic change of day and night
● Perfect 3D graphics and unique style
● Amazing weapons, tools and instruments
● Action running and survival game!

Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE is super exciting maze running and climb craft game that is full of logic challenges and amazing action parts where you have to fight against spider monsters. It will take a lot of playing time to find the exit and complete the labyrinth. If you are fond of crafting, running and taking part in challenges than Climb Craft: Maze Run 2 FREE is exactly what you are going to like and love! Enter the labyrinth, collect goods and resources, fight monsters, craft tools and weapons, find the exit and escape the maze! Take your time and enjoy this crazy maze game right now! We promise you that you and your family will have a lot of fun! Good luck!
